snippet: William Lynch was acquitted on Thursday of assaulting a retired priest he says molested him more than three decades ago.
abstract: California jury acquits William Lynch of assaulting retired priest Rev Jerold Lindner; Lynch testified that Lindner molested him more than three decades ago, causing him trauma that led to alcohol abuse, depression and suicide attempts.
lead_paragraph: William Lynch was acquitted on Thursday of assaulting a retired priest he says molested him more than three decades ago.

headline.main: California: Acquittal in Beating of Retired Priest
headline.print_headline: California: Acquittal In Beating of Retired Priest
